circumstances: In flight, the twin engine airplane suffered a wing failure and crashed near Edwards AFB. The aircraft was destroyed and all three occupants were killed.
probable_cause:
Airframe failure in flight. The following contributing factors were reported:
- Wings: spars,
- Fatigue fracture, 
- Left wing separated during maneuvering flight, 
- Fatigue found at wing station 141 on lower forward spar cap.
